energizedSpire:ReceptionProblemsKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Reception Problems is an Unplayable Status card that when drawn makes you lose #b2 #yFocus until the beginning of your next turn.

energizedSpire:DepressionKeyword.DESCRIPTION: In this #yStance, you draw #b1 fewer card each turn.

energizedSpire:BurningRoomsKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Enemies are empowered and drop the Emerald Key.
